name: StackOverflow 1024px Screen Fix
description: StackOverflow's page layout does not fit into 1024px screens by a few pixels. As a consequence, a horizontal scroll bar shows up. This stylesheet makes the necessary modifications to fix that on small screens. It is disabled on wide screens.
additional_info:
Discussion over here at SO meta. 

http://meta.stackoverflow.com/questions/283703/new-page-layout-too-wide-for-1024px/283941#283941
